name: Zoomin' Through Space
description:
Zoomin' Through Space (POTSIAWUISW 2) is a short little mini game made in a little under a week for a Game Programming Design Principles course (this week's focus being the  factory method pattern.) Controls:
  • W and S or up and down arrows to move
  • Space to shoot
Credits:
  • Design, Programming, and Art - toadletgames
  • Font - Kiwi Soda by jeti
